sourcesContent:
JavaScript Effects

This component demonstrates fetching data protected by auth from the server.

Cool stuff is waiting for authenticated people

Username:
Password:
Confirm password:

Loading...

Welcome, {{ fx.username }}

import { Component, Inject } from '@angular/core'; import { HttpClient } from '@angular/common/http'; import { NgForm } from '@angular/forms'; @Component({ selector: 'app-fetch-data', templateUrl: './fetch-data.component.html' }) export class FetchDataComponent { public fx?: Effects; public authenticated: boolean = false; public register: boolean = false; public operationFailed: boolean = false; public operationReason: string = ""; public fetch() { this.operationFailed = false; this.http.get(this.baseUrl + 'effects').subscribe(result => { this.fx = result; if (this.fx.username) { this.authenticated = true; } else { this.authenticated = false; } }, error => { this.authenticated = false; this.operationFailed = true; this.operationReason = error; }); } public toggleRegister() { this.register = this.register ? false : true; }; public validate(f: NgForm) { if (f.valid) { if (this.register) { if (f.value.password === f.value.pconfirm) { this.submitRegistration(f.value); } } else { this.login(f.value); } } } public submitRegistration(upwd: UserPwd) { this.operationFailed = false; this.http.post(this.baseUrl + 'identity/v1/register', { username: upwd.username, password: upwd.password } ) .subscribe(_ => { this.authenticated = true; this.fetch(); }, error => { this.operationFailed = true; this.operationReason = error; }); }; public login(uwpd: UserPwd) { this.operationFailed = false; this.http.post(this.baseUrl + 'identity/v1/login', { username: uwpd.username, password: uwpd.password, cookieMode: true }) .subscribe(_ => { this.authenticated = true; this.fetch(); }, error => { this.authenticated = false; this.operationFailed = true; this.operationReason = error; }); }; constructor(private http: HttpClient, @Inject('BASE_URL') private baseUrl: string) { http.get(baseUrl + 'effects').subscribe(result => { this.fx = result; if (this.fx.username) { this.authenticated = true; } }, error => console.error(error)); } } interface Effects { username: string; effects: string[]; } interface UserPwd { username: string; password: string; }
